hero.headline: Bring your business online.
hero.sub: Transform your digital presence. We handle everything.

homeIntro.title: Your Digital Partner in Brussels
homeIntro.p1: Zypta is a Belgian digital agency supporting entrepreneurs, freelancers and SMEs in their online transformation. Based in Brussels, we create custom websites, e-commerce stores and visibility strategies that make a real difference.
homeIntro.p2: Whether you're starting your business or looking to boost your digital presence, we adapt our services to your goals. Showcase sites for professionals, WordPress or Shopify e-commerce, natural search (SEO), Google Ads campaigns, logo design and branding: we cover everything you need to grow your business.
homeIntro.p3: Our approach focuses on simplicity and transparency. A first conversation to understand your needs, a clear proposal with quote and timeline, then step-by-step support until launch. No jargon, no surprises: we build together.

homeServices.title: What We Offer
homeServices.s1: Modern, ergonomic showcase websites for hairdressers, plumbers, restaurants and SMEs. A clear online presence that turns visitors into customers.
homeServices.s2: E-commerce stores on WordPress or Shopify, easy to manage. Sell online with a professional design and tools tailored to your business.
homeServices.s3: SEO and Google Ads campaigns to boost your visibility. Natural search and paid advertising to attract qualified customers.
homeServices.s4: Logo design and visual identity. Unique designs that reflect your brand and set you apart from the competition.

howItWorks.title: Simple. Fast. Efficient.
howItWorks.step1desc: Tell us about your needs, your business and your goals. A first exchange (email, call or video) is enough to lay the groundwork and understand your vision.
howItWorks.step2desc: Select the service that fits your project: showcase site, e-commerce, SEO, branding. We provide a detailed quote and a realistic timeline.
howItWorks.step3desc: Fill out our form, validate the proposal, and we handle the rest. Regular updates, delivery on time, and support even after launch.

forWho.title: Who Is This For?
forWho.desc: Our services are for anyone looking to digitize their business. Whether you're a hairdresser, plumber, restaurateur, startup founder, freelancer or creative — if you want a strong, professional online presence, we're here for you. We work with varied budgets and projects of all sizes, from simple showcase sites to full e-commerce stores.

whyUs.title: Why Zypta?
whyUs.point1: Founded by a certified e-business graduate (EPHEC) with Scrum, Google Ads and Opquast certifications. Recognized expertise at the service of your project.
whyUs.point2: A wide range of services with unique designs. Each site is tailored to your business and audience, no generic templates.
whyUs.point3: Proven experience in digital solutions. Showcase sites, e-commerce, SEO and ad campaigns: we master the full chain.
whyUs.point4: A simple, fast and efficient process. Clear quotes, deadlines met, transparent communication. We move forward together, stress-free.

finalCta.headline: Ready to go digital?
finalCta.sub: Don't wait – let's build your online success together.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: Our range of services is designed to elevate your brand and establish your digital identity.
services.s1desc: Modern, ergonomic websites for professionals like hairdressers, plumbers, or small businesses who need a clear and effective online presence.
services.s2desc: Powerful, easy-to-manage online stores tailored to your products and audience.
services.s3desc: Get discovered online. Improve visibility, ranking, and paid ad strategies to boost traffic and leads.
services.s4desc: Unique logos that reflect your identity and attract the right attention.

about.founderBio: Passionate about digital from the start, Mahammoud Boulale founded Zypta to make the web accessible to everyone. An e-business graduate with certifications in key areas, he brings his expertise and creativity to entrepreneurs and SMEs who want to stand out online.
about.storyText: Zypta is a young, independent structure born from Mahammoud Boulale's passion for digital. Founded by an e-business graduate, we blend technical expertise, creativity, and agility to support entrepreneurs, freelancers, and small businesses.
about.missionText: To make digital accessible, impactful, and efficient for anyone looking to get started, grow professionally, or stand out on the web. We build with you, not just for you.
about.certsSub: All these certifications belong to Mahammoud Boulale — certified skills for real-world results.
about.cert1Issuer: Higher education degree in digital strategy, e-commerce and web project management.
about.cert2Issuer: Scrum Institute International — Agile product management and strategic prioritization.
about.cert3Issuer: Scrum Institute International — Agile team leadership and project facilitation.
about.cert4Issuer: Google — Building and optimizing search network advertising campaigns.
about.cert5Issuer: Web quality mastery certification — Confirmed level (760/1000).
about.cert6Issuer: Les Jeunes Entreprises — Creating and managing a real mini-company.
about.v1: Simplicity — Making the digital world clear and accessible
about.v3: Trust — Working with transparency and honesty
about.v4: Agility — Adapting quickly to your needs
about.processText: Everything starts with a first contact (email, call, or video meeting). We discuss your goals, provide a clear proposal with a quote and timeline. We work together step by step with full transparency — from first draft to launch, and beyond.
about.faq1q: What types of websites do you offer?
about.faq1a: We offer modern, ergonomic showcase websites, e-commerce stores (WordPress/Shopify), as well as branding and digital marketing services.
about.faq2a: A showcase website typically takes 1 to 2 weeks. An e-commerce site can take 2 to 4 weeks depending on complexity. We always give you a clear timeline upfront.
about.faq3a: We start with a conversation to understand your needs. Then we provide a quote and timeline. We work together step by step with regular check-ins.
about.faq4a: Yes, we offer maintenance plans to keep your site updated, secure, and performing at its best.
about.faq5q: Do you provide SEO and online advertising?
about.faq5a: Absolutely. We optimize your SEO and manage your advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads) to maximize your online visibility.
about.faq6q: What does your logo service include?
about.faq6a: Our service includes creative research, multiple logo proposals, revisions, and delivery in high-resolution formats for web and print.
about.faq7a: Yes, we set up and manage your email campaigns through platforms like Mailchimp or Brevo to effectively engage your audience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Zypta is committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacy.collectText: We collect the data you provide through our contact and preview forms: name, email, phone, business name, project description, and optionally files (photo, logo). This data is sent by email to our team to process your request.
privacy.cookiesText: Our site uses only essential cookies for functionality. We do not use advertising or third-party tracking cookies.
privacy.essentialCookiesIntro: The following cookies are required for the site to function and cannot be disabled:
privacy.essentialCookie1Purpose: Stores your choice to accept or refuse cookies
privacy.rightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete and object to your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@zypta.be. We will process your request within 30 days.
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding your personal data: contact@zypta.be
